item.description:
What better day than TAX DAY to talk about money? Come join me for a glass of wine to toast your refund or to drown your sorrows (in case you owe Uncle Sam.)

There are so many issues around money for most of us. Women are NOT the same as men when it comes to taking care of ourselves and our finances! We have different issues and different needs.

So -- let me teach you what you NEED to know!

Cheers, Karen
617-650-8716

If online payment is a problem for you, please let me know.
item.how_to_find_us: 6th floor - left off the elevators, then left into the meeting site
item.name: Women and Money
